info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:01PM CDT until August 29 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ARMSTRONG AND RANDALL COUNTIES... At 401 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles south of Lake Tanglewood, or 6 miles east of Canyon, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Canyon, Lake Tanglewood, Mescalero Park, Buffalo Lake, Wayside, Umbarger, Palo Duro Canyon and Timbercreek Canyon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
